author: Tucker Reals
title: Coronavirus updates: Global COVID-19 deaths soar as China hikes Wuhan toll
description: New disease has killed more than 145,000 people around the world, and China concedes toll in epicenter city was higher, but insists there was no cover-up.
content:
China's coronavirus ground-zero city of Wuhan on Friday abruptly raised its death toll by 50 percent, saying many fatal cases were "mistakenly reported" or missed entirely in an admission that comes amid growing global doubts about Chinese transparency.
